title: The Last Of Us
synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

title: Arcane
synopsis: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

title: Love, Death & Robots
synopsis: A collection of animated short stories that span various genres including science fiction, fantasy, horror and comedy.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
synopsis: A Street Kid trying to survive in a technology and body modification-obsessed city of the future. Having everything to lose, he chooses to stay alive by becoming an Edgerunner, a Mercenary outlaw also known as a Cyberpunk.

title: Castlevania
synopsis: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly creatures controlled by Dracula.

title: Your Name.
synopsis: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

title: Weathering with You
synopsis: A high-school boy who has run away to Tokyo befriends a girl who appears to be able to manipulate the weather.

title: Breaking Bad
synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

title: Better Call Saul
synopsis: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.

title: Game of Thrones
synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

title: House of the Dragon
synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

title: Stranger Things
synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

title: The Boys
synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

title: Chernobyl
synopsis: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

title: Black Mirror
synopsis: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech multiverse where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Rick and Morty
synopsis: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

title: South Park
synopsis: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

title: The Skit Begins
synopsis: The story of five young people in their late 20s who try to overcome their great failures in life.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.
